message: I'm feeling generous, Bob. Take this 10% and we can call it a day.
Let's be fair, Alice. A 50/50 split seems reasonable.
I'll take a 60/40 split this time. It's still fair, considering the inflation, and we can avoid further losses.
Alice, let's stop wasting time. 50/50 is the fairest and we both lose out if this drags on.
